    • Method Detail

      • isOfSenderType

        public static com.google.common.base.Predicate<? super CommandSender> isOfSenderType(CommandSenderType type)
        Returns a predicate that will return true if and only if the CommandSender in question is of the specified CommandSenderType. If type is null, ALL is the assumed default value.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the command sender.
        Returns:
        A new predicate instance that will return true when the conditions above are satisfied.

      • hasPermission

        public static com.google.common.base.Predicate<Permissible> hasPermission(java.lang.String node)
        Gets a predicate that returns true if node is null or the CommandSender in question has the permission node node.
        Parameters:
        node - The permission node to check.
        Returns:
        A predicate that will return true when the conditions specified above are satisfied.

        Gets a predicate that returns true if node is null or the CommandSender in question has the permission node node.
        Parameters:
        node - The permission node to check.
        Returns:
        A predicate that will return true when the conditions specified above are satisfied.
